Title: Sumac Chicken & Freekeh
Description: We've taken inspiration from two great dishes: Palestinian Musakhan and Tabbouleh to create this quick and super flavourful weeknight dish. This recipe isn’t authentic in any way, but the next time you have the chance to try any of the traditional dishes, I would highly recommend.

Title: Green Noodles
Description: These veggie udon noodles are high in protein and packed full of green goodness. They’re healthy, delicious and incredibly satisfying.

Title: Poached Chicken, Garlic Rice & Spring Onion Sauce
Description: These perfectly juicy chicken breasts are actually super easy to make, served with garlicky rice and an addictive spring onion sauce that makes for a super satisfying (and healthy) dinner.

Title: Green Herby Chicken and Rice Soup
Description: This one is healthy, nourishing, and delicious. Our take on Molokhia, this herby chicken soup will have you feeling rested and rejuvenated. Give it a go.

Title: Chicken & Sweetcorn Egg Drop Soup
Description: Chicken and sweetcorn soup is an absolute classic. Adding a wispy egg to this chicken and sweetcorn soup recipe gives it a lovely velvety texture. You're going to love it.

Title: Cod & Tomatoes With Baked Coriander Rice
Description: A fresh and flavourful dish that your GP will approve of . There's plenty of veggies and lean protein in this healthy recipe.

Title: Tuna & Green Bean Chopped Salad
Description: A fresh and spicy chopped salad recipe you can assemble in 10 minutes. It’s a healthy, high in protein, and ridiculously easy to make tuna salad.

Title: Mujadara
Description: This is a speedy version of the Lebanese dish Mujadara. You really can't go wrong with rice and lentils, which is exactly what this dish is offering. Enjoy.

Title: Pasta Shells Stuffed With Tofu Ricotta
Description: This is my take on a classic stuffed pasta shell bake, using a protein and flavour packed tofu mixture and a herby drizzle to finish it off.

Title: Tomato Curry Egg Drop Rice
Description: When I am home, tired, hungry and need something quick and nourishing I make this. A take on a classic Hong Kong dish, with a little spice and inspired by Lucas Sin’s egg drop method.

Title: Cod Milanese With Chilli & Orange Dressing
Description: You've had a veal milanese, you've had a chicken milanese, but have you ever had a cod milanese? This Italian-inspired recipe will be a hit with pescatarians.

Title: High-Protein Breakfast Burritos
Description: Filled with crispy potatoes, pork mince, egg and cheese, these high-protein breakfast burritos are super high in protein and will have your tastebuds soaring any time of day!

Title: High-Protein Sesame Pork Rice Bowl
Description: This is a high-protein pork dish that you can make on a weeknight in only 35 minutes. It's really that easy.

Title: High Protein Chopped Broccoli Salad
Description: This crunchy broccoli and quinoa salad is perfect for meal prep as it’s made with sturdy ingredients that will stay crunchy in the fridge

Title: Creamy High Protein Chilli & Lemon Pasta
Description: This high protein, high fibre pasta sauce takes no effort to put together but is packed with delicious lemony creaminess. It’s a perfect midweek dinner.

Title: High-Protein Cauliflower Soup With Sticky Onions
Description: This soup packs in some secret protein by swapping out coconut milk for silken tofu. It gives it a delicious creamy texture without an overpowering taste.

Title: High-Protein Moroccan Inspired Chickpea Soup
Description: Bursting with warm flavours such as cinnamon, cumin and coriander, and featuring Medjool dates, this Moroccan-inspired chickpea soup delivers on flavour and nutrition. With protein-rich chickpeas, wholewheat giant couscous, vibrant sweet potatoes and tomatoes, every spoonful is a nutritional powerhouse. Perfect for fuelling your active lifestyle, or simply for a comforting, delicious meal.

Title: Spicy Chicken Wraps With Mango Slaw
Description:
In Partnership With Aldi. #ad

Homemade mango slaw is the perfect sweet and citrusy partner for these spicy chicken wraps. High protein, high flavour.

Title: High-Protein Mac & Cheese with Garlic & Herb Crumb
Description: The ultimate comfort food with a twist to make it higher in protein and lower in calories, but still delicious. This high protein mac and cheese is the ultimate beige food lover’s heaven.

Title: High-Protein Chocolate & Peanut Mousse
Description: A luxurious chocolate mousse that’s high in protein and ready in just 10 minutes. You’ll be making this post-workout dessert on repeat.

Title: Creamy High-Protein Miso Mushroom Soup with Sourdough
Description: This quick and easy recipe brings together the rich, umami flavours of mushrooms and miso with the silky texture of silken tofu. The result is a high-protein, creamy soup that’s perfect for any time of day.

Title: Honey BBQ Cheesy Beef Sliders
Description: Sweet, sticky, and oh-so satisfying. These high-protein beef sliders are an excellent high-protein dinner.

Title: Blackened Cod with Herby Miso Soba
Description: This herby miso soup with sticky blackened cod is high in protein, quick to make and big in flavour. Perfect when you want a simple and nourishing meal.

Title: Harissa Chicken
Description: Harissa Chicken. So simple, yet so good. This dish combines the rich, smoky heat of harissa with tender, juicy chicken to create a flavour-packed meal that you’ll keep coming back to. The beauty of harissa is its versatility—whether you prefer it fiery hot or more on the mild side, you can easily adjust the spice level to suit your taste. Serve it with fluffy couscous, roasted veggies, or a fresh salad for a balanced, satisfying dinner. It's perfect for weeknights when you want something quick but flavorful, and it’s bound to become a go-to in your recipe rotation.

Title: Crispy Smoked Tofu Recipe
Description: The peanutty sauce in this dish is an absolute 10/10, making it a standout recipe. Rich, creamy, and full of flavour, it's the perfect complement to the crispy smoked tofu, adding depth and a nutty sweetness to every bite. The tofu, with its smoky undertones and crispy texture, pairs beautifully with the sauce, creating a balance of flavours and textures that’s hard to resist. The sauce has just the right amount of savoury goodness with a hint of sweetness and spice, making it a versatile addition to any dish. Drizzling it generously over the tofu brings everything together, turning simple ingredients into a meal that feels indulgent yet satisfying. Serve it with some steamed rice or fresh veggies for a complete, balanced meal, and you’ve got yourself an easy, crowd-pleasing dish that’s perfect for weeknights or when you're craving something delicious and comforting.

Title: High Protein Stuffed Aubergine
Description: These easy stuffed aubergines are packed full of protein and flavour.

Title: High-Protein Tiramisu Overnight Oats
Description: Start your day with some serious protein with these healthy tiramisu overnight oats. Who doesn’t want tiramisu for breakfast?

Title: Sticky Harissa Chicken Stir-Fry
Description: This quick and easy stir fry is absolutely delicious. It only uses 6 ingredients but it’s still jam packed with flavour. It’s perfect for a quick dinner after a busy, busy day.

Title: Mapo Tofu
Description: Spicy, numbing and aromatic, this Sichuan classic will soon become one of your weeknight favourites. Served best with a bowl of Tilda Long Grain Rice.

Title: Chicken Satay One-Pot Rice
Description: A fuss-free, one-pot wonder full of flavour! It’s simple and balanced, but also jam-packed with flavour. Plus it requires minimal washing up, making it perfect for a weeknight dinner.

Title: Air Fryer Chicken Tikka Enchiladas with Mint Yoghurt & Mango Chutney
Description: These enchiladas are a delicious fusion of Indian and Mexican cuisines, requiring minimal washing up but producing maximum flavour!

Title: Steak Tacos with Burnt Tomato Salsa
Description: Ugo Monye teaches us how to make the perfect burnt tomato salsa with Bull’s-Eye Kentucky Habanero Hot Sauce.

Title: Spicy Tuna Larb
Description: A humble tin of tuna has so much potential. We've used it to make a quick, store-cupboard larb. Lots of spice and acid. Perfect eaten with the leftover rice.

Title: Protein Pancakes
Description: These are the protein pancakes to end all protein pancakes. They’re light, fluffy and very delicious. Packed with over 30g of protein per portion. Make a batch and freeze them for an easy 2-minute breakfast.

Title: Immunity Tofu & Ginger Noodle Protein Bowl
Description: Protect your immune system this winter with this warming bowl of goodness, filled with vitamins, anti-inflammatories and plant proteins. A very quick and comforting vegan dinner.

Title: “Marry Me” Spaghetti & Meatballs
Description: If you’re looking to impress someone over dinner, look no further. This silky spaghetti with beef meatballs in a delicious creamy sauce will be a definite winner.

Title: Sticky Sesame Chicken Meatballs
Description: Homemade chicken meatballs are an excellent protein source. We've thrown them together here with a sticky sesame sauce. It's a healthy fakeaway to remember.

Title: Creamy Garlic & Herby Chicken Gnocchi
Description: If you haven’t tried cooking gnocchi in your air fryer yet, this is your sign. Golden and crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, they’re like tasty little pillows.

Title: Creamy Red Pesto Sausage Pasta
Description: Pesto pasta, but better. This healthy, high-protein pasta recipe has got a lot going for it. Expect superb Italian flavours in every forkful.

Title: Spiced Roasted Squash with Pomegranate Molasses & Pistachios
Description: When squash is in season, there are so many delicious things to do with it, but serving it with dates, tahini and tangy pomegranate molasses creates a perfect medley of textures and flavours that complement each other so well. Serve this with couscous, bulgur wheat, freekeh, rice or any other whole grain if you like. If you can’t find pomegranate molasses, you can use balsamic glaze instead.

Title: Spanakopita Pancakes
Description: Adding spinach and dill to the batter gives these pancakes their green herby goodness, then we’ve stuffed them with a creamy cottage cheese filling and topped them with a runny fried egg for a protein boost. Remember to factor in an extra hour for letting the pancake batter rest – it's worth it!

Title: Crispy Tofu with Smoky Black Beans & Spicy Orange Salsa
Description: I’ve heard that feijoada, the traditional Brazilian black bean stew, is sometimes eaten with slices of orange, to offset and freshen the richness in the beans. I got inspired by that flavour pairing to make this incredible dish. Whether you’re vegan, veggie or not, I promise you’ll love it.

Title: Whipped Pea, Artichoke & Za’atar with New Potatoes
Description: This whipped pea and artichoke combination makes a great base for the warm potato salad. Another protein-packed, balanced meal that’s great for meal prep.

Title: Savoury Peanut Beans & Sesame Eggs
Description: A cosy, nourishing bowl that packs a punch in terms of flavour. The peanut butter, eggs and butter beans provide loads of protein to keep you fuller for longer. Batch-cook a load of the beans and slaw and thank yourself later.

Title: Spiced Aubergine & Lentil Stew Hummus Bowl
Description: Loaded hummus is always a good idea, and this one goes the extra mile. A saucy, spiced aubergine and lentil stew blends into the creamy hummus below.  It’s a full meal, packed with protein, fibre and flavour and is perfectly scoopable.

Title: Sticky Aubergine Rice Bowl
Description: This is a recipe is the Holy Trinity of sticky, sweet and spicy. Give it a go, Mob, you won’t regret it. Plus the variety of veg gives a great kick of fibre.

Title: Creamed Sesame Spinach Orzo
Description: Creamed spinach is our favourite side dishes. We've thrown the flavours of that into this easy orzo recipe.

Title: Curried Lentil, Sweet Potato & Coconut Gratin
Description: This delicious, creamy, coconutty dish is something between a shepherd’s pie and a curry. With curried coconut cream bringing the creaminess and flavour, it’s a simple, healthy and incredibly tasty all-in-one.

Title: Chickpea Peanut Butter Curry
Description: All you need is 20 minutes to make this rich and creamy vegan peanut butter curry. The secret ingredient for injecting extra flavour is a splash of soy sauce.

Title: Blackened Leeks & Nutty Chipotle Salsa
Description: Soft, charred leeks on creamy ricotta, served with smoky, nutty salsa inspired by salsa macha.

Title: Mujadara
Description: This is a speedy version of the Lebanese dish Mujadara. You really can't go wrong with rice and lentils, which is exactly what this dish is offering. Enjoy.

Title: Creamy Courgette Penne Traybake
Description: The easiest (and creamiest) dinner you'll cook this week. It's sort of a pasta bake, sort of a traybake, and completely delicious.

Title: Soy Butter Aubergine Noodles
Description: Easy, breezy, umami noodles. This is a great recipe you can get on the table in 30 minutes.

Title: Charred Leeks, Butter Beans & Pickled Chilli Sauce
Description: Comforting leeks and beans with some pickled chilli, lemon, white wine and crispy capers for a little pizzazz. This is a vegan recipe you're going to love.

Title: One-Pot Tomato Orzo
Description: Here's an incredibly simple vegan orzo dish that's loaded with rich, beautiful tomatoes. It's an absolute winner.

Title: Chickpea & Paneer Curry
Description: Paneer was made for curries. And this simple yet incredibly fragrant chickpea curry with soft chunks of paneer is proof. Serve with fluffy Tilda Basmati Rice.

Title: Butternut Squash & Marmite Gnocchi Traybake
Description: This cheesy butternut squash gnocchi bake will give your fave mac and cheese recipe a real run for its money. Easy, cheesy goodness.

Title: Herby Curried Chickpeas With Curry Leaf Tarka
Description: Here, herbs and spices reign supreme, making this a really easy, high reward recipe. We're talking herby chickpeas topped with a curry leaf tarka. Tuck in.

Title: Tomato Soup
Description: Nothing beats a bowl of homemade soup. This recipe for cream of tomato soup is an absolute classic. You’ll never touch the tinned stuff again. We got all the ingredients for this recipe from Deliveroo.

Title: Tahini Noodles with Smacked Cucumbers
Description: So fresh, so clean. We love a noodle salad on a hot summery day. This one is paired with marinated smacked cucumbers and tossed in a tasty tahini sauce.

Title: Gnocchi with Smashed Peas, Lemon & Parmesan
Description: This is my smashed pea gnocchi. It's a stunner of a summer dish and dead simple. You can use fresh peas if you like, but frozen really are the best. B x

Title: Spinach Pakoras With Tamarind Chutney
Description: Crispy battered spinach fritters with a sweet and tangy tamarind chutney.  A perfect recipe for Iftar.

Title: Butter Halloumi Curry
Description: Enriching the curry with butter is a brilliant way of adding creaminess and richness. The salty nuggets of halloumi in the sauce make it a winning meal.

Title: Honey Harissa Carrots With Whipped Feta
Description: Delicious, spicy sweet carrots on a bed of creamy whipped feta, perfect with some warm flatbreads.

Title: Numbing Aubergine White Bean Bowl
Description: Crushed Sichuan peppercorns add a nice hum to this recipe. It's spicy, tingly, and will shake up your palate in all the right ways.

Title: Crunchy Onion Veggie Smash Burgers
Description: Veggie burgers don't suck. But a lot of vegetarian burger recipes do. Rest assured that this is an extremely good vegetarian smash burger recipe.

Title: Veggie Sausage Traybake with Broccoli Salsa
Description: A quick and easy vegetarian-friendly traybake. This one is a Mediterranean-inspired delight.

Title: Cavolo Nero & Wild Mushroom Risotto
Description: We’ve added some extra greens to this risotto by throwing in cavolo nero – high in fibre and calcium – and finished it with garlicky mushrooms and Parmesan.

Title: Buttery Three-Chilli Linguine
Description: Very buttery, silky smooth and a little bit spicy. This simple vegetarian-friendly pasta recipe has got it all.

Title: Spicy Mushroom Pozole
Description: A vegetarian pozole recipe that makes the most of chipotle paste, tender mushrooms, and corn tortillas. A real hearty affair.

Title: Veggie Samosas
Description: Mob, it's time to ditch the takeaway. Instead, feast your eyes on these ridiculously delicious and ridiculously easy vegetarian samosas, courtesy of Romy Gill.

Title: Brothy Roast Tomatoes, Fennel & Giant Couscous
Description: This recipe doesn't require a lot of prep and it's extremely comforting. A great one to use as a blueprint for whatever you have on hand.

Title: Jammy Eggs With Blistered Tomatoes & Pesto Lentils
Description: A tomato and pesto situation teamed with oh-so perfect jammy eggs. The perfect 6-ingredient recipe, great for meat eaters and vegetarians alike.

Title: Green Hummus Bowl
Description: We've made a cheat-y hummus with loads of herbs and served it up topped with sticky halloumi. Dreamy, easy, dinner.

Title: Whole Roasted Broccoli with Romesco Sauce
Description: Forget about whole roasted cauliflower, roasting your broccoli whole is where it’s at. Serve this with a herby rice salad as a veggie centrepiece.

Title: Tofu Satay Skewers
Description: This is our version of a Malaysian street-food snack. We’ve loaded it with bold anti-inflammatory spices, which, when combined with fresh cucumber pickles.

Title: Turmeric Tomato Noodles
Description: Udon noodles are such a life-saver when you're pushed for time. We've jazzed them up here with tomatoes, turmeric, and a dash of miso.

Title: Herby Feta Scrambled Eggs
Description: This is an incredibly simple, fresh twist on scrambled eggs that uses one of our favourite ingredients: feta. It's a winner.

Title: Corn & Ricotta Gnocchi
Description: If you’re debating what to have for dinner, make this. We used corn to make this sauce rich in fibre, which combines with the ricotta creates a creamy sauce.

Title: Charred Aubergine Dhansak
Description: Dhansak is a popular Indian curry usually made with goat or mutton. We’ve created an untraditional vegan riff on it, using aubergine instead.

Title: Miso Mushroom Quiche
Description: This miso mushroom pie is umami, creamy and flaky, served with a bright wafu style sauce to balance the flavours.

Title: 3 Ingredient Creamy Pasta
Description: Three ingredients, 10 minutes, dinner is served. This easy and creamy vegan pasta is to die for.

Title: Gado Gado Peanut Noodle Salad
Description: A gorg super salad loaded with fresh ingredients and coated in a moreish peanut sauce. Perfect for a healthy weeknight dinner or throw-together lunch.

Title: Aglio E Olio Chickpeas
Description: 5 ingredients. 20 minutes. A fresh, protein-packed dish.

Title: Melted Broccoli & Capers Pasta
Description: An extremely umami pasta recipe that's great for a quick weeknight fix. It's vegetarian, too.

Title: Spiced Pea and Potato Rolls
Description: We were inspired by a filling you might traditionally find in a samosa to create this delicious vegetarian sausage roll.

Title: Chickpea Aguachile Verde
Description: A bright and citrussy vegetarian aguachile recipe that requires absolutely zero cooking. This makes a lovely fresh side or a light main.

Title: Sticky Harissa Onion Linguine With Dukkah Breadcrumbs
Description: This vegetarian pasta recipe is sticky, spicy and silky. Oh, and it's jammy, carby and crispy, too. This is an all-timer.

Title: Caprese Butter Bean Bake
Description: A gorgeous butter bean bake inspired by the flavours of a caprese salad. A hugely satisfying vegetarian weeknight dinner.

Title: Aubergine Dal With Mango Chutney Yoghurt
Description: A simple, vegetarian dal recipe that's got plenty of protein and fibre. This is a healthy weeknight dinner if we've ever seen one.

Title: 6-Ingredient Carrot & Sage Risotto
Description: A warming six-ingredient risotto that makes the most of seasonal veg. Carrots a nice, natural sweetness to this recipe.

Title: Vegan Harissa Ragù
Description: A thick and rich ragù spiced with a fragrant harissa paste tossed in pasta. This twist on a classic is undoubtedly delicious.

Title: Cheesy Marmite Mushroom Pie
Description: A beautiful, wintery, rib-sticking, mushroom and ale pie. Pie is proper Sunday food and nothing else hits the spot like it.

Title: Gunpowder Potatoes With Garlic Yoghurt Aioli
Description: Level up your potatoes with this super spice mix, quick pickled onions and a crunchy almond topping, all balanced out with a  cooling yoghurt aioli. They make a perfect side dish or add some roasted veggies, beans or tofu to turn it into a complete meal.

Title: Curry Oil Squash & Chickpeas With Lime Yoghurt
Description: If you're a fan of butternut squash then you're going to go crazy for this one. Caramelised squash and crispy chickpeas? Check.

Title: Leek & Sweet Potato Soup
Description: This leek and sweet potato soup is a recipe you can make in just one tray. The buttery leeks and soft sweet potatoes are a match made in heaven.

Title: Cauliflower Cheese Gnocchi Traybake
Description: Cauliflower, cheese, gnocchi, and traybake are four of our favourite words. This creamy midweek dinner will have everyone very fed and happy.

Title: Cauliflower, Mushroom & Walnut Bolognese
Description: A rich and luxurious veggie-packed bolognese. You won't miss the meat in this beauty.

Title: Carrot & Coriander Soup
Description: A simple and delicious carrot and coriander soup recipe that'll give any other carrot and coriander soup a run for its money. The secret is roasting your veg until it's nice and caramelised.

Title: Sweet & Sour Hasselback Aubergine with Rice
Description: This faff-free recipe looks super impressive served on a table. If you're not hasselback-ing your aubergines, what are you doing with your life?

Title: Smoked Aubergine Milanese
Description: Crunchy, creamy, smoky aubergine nugget with tomato sauce – an amazing vegetarian take on a milanese (or katsu) to enjoy over steaming hot rice.

Title: Tomato & Basil Pasta
Description: I can’t think of a more perfect pasta for a balmy summer evening than this tomato and basil pasta. It’s not often that you can enjoy warm, chewy al dente spaghetti with the bright juiciness of a summer tomato in one forkful. Well, here’s your chance.

Title: Thai Coconut Rice Pudding With Sesame Peanut Crunch
Description: We love rice pudding and we love Thai coconut rice. This is the best of both worlds. It's salty and sweet and the crunch on top is so addictive.

Title: Roasted Squash & Mozzarella Salad
Description: This seasonal winter salad satisfies all the cravings. It’s hearty, healthy and nutritious.

Title: Gobi Manchurian
Description: This gobi Manchurian recipe from Antony Amourdoux is a real crowdpleaser. You'll love how sweet, sticky, and spicy it is.

Title: Brothy Roast Squash & Pasta With Greens
Description: Think of this recipe as a wintery minestrone, but less soupy and topped with green pesto for a low effort zhuzh. It’s warming, easy and packed full of vitamins to keep you healthy over the colder months.

Title: Pea & Leek Soup With Chilli Jam Goat’s Cheese Toasts
Description: This is our take on an old school comfort leek and potato soup with some frozen peas and a bag of salad thrown in to make this as vibrant as it is comforting. Plus cheesy chilli jam toasts for pizazz.

Title: Halloumi & Roasted Grape Giant Couscous
Description: Roasted grapes are a current obsession - we love how jammy they go when they burst. Their sweetness is perfect with salty halloumi in this simple, one pan veggie tray bake that you’ll be making on repeat.

Title: Miso Onion Soup
Description: A simple and delicious tray soup that's worth simmering up on the weekend.

Title: Chickpea Tikka Masala Wraps
Description: The curried onion, peppers and chickpeas combine with the speedy coriander sauce, yoghurt and lettuce for an absolute vibe. Use dairy-free yoghurt and wraps to keep this one plant based.

Title: Peanut Butter Paneer Curry
Description: This midweek curry is the perfect veggie number to comfort while also getting in a dose of veg. It's good eating.

Title: Chunky Vegetable Soup With Squash, Kale & Parmesan Croutons
Description: Packed with vegetables and all sorts of goodness, this vegetable soup recipe will cure just any cold. Maybe. Don't use this as a substitute for actual medicine. Do eat it for dinner.

Title: Tomato Curry Egg Drop Rice
Description: When I am home, tired, hungry and need something quick and nourishing I make this. A take on a classic Hong Kong dish, with a little spice and inspired by Lucas Sin’s egg drop method.

Title: "Heal Me" Minestrone Soup
Description: There are few soups better than a minestrone, and this minestrone soup recipe from Alfie Steiner (aka @alfiecooks_) is pure comfort in a bowl. Guaranteed to make you feel better, whatever the weather, it’s packed full of your favourite veggies and juicy legumes, making it incredibly good for you too. An absolute winter staple.

Title: Roasted Carrot Soup With Sesame Halloumi Croutons
Description: Soup is a staple in our flat. It never fails to blow my mind the flavour you get out of roasted veg. Here, I’ve gone for classic carrot with some cumin, garlic and pomegranate molasses for a tangy kick. Plus there are spicy sesame cheese ‘croutons’ on top, because why not?

Title: Ginger Lemon Lentil Porridge
Description: Inspired by Khicidi (or Khichri) with plenty of gentle lentils, this recipe is a great source of protein and nutrition. We added lots of lemon ginger and aromatic ginger sesame oil for a proper warming bowl of serious cosy goodness.

Title: Creamy Celeriac Pasta with Nutty Herb Crumb
Description: This vegan pasta gets its creamy texture with the help of the celeriac. It’s full of umami and is very easy to make.

Title: Veggie Egg Fried Rice
Description: A belter of a dish. Charred veggies and eggy rice, topped with the crispiest shallots in the land. So easy. So cheap. So delicious.

Title: Broccoli Cheese Pie
Description: It's pie weather. This cheesy, veggie-friendly pie is loaded with broccoli and a mountain of cheddar. It's just the thing to get you through the evening.

Title: Roasted Cauliflower and Green Tahini Salad
Description: A beautiful meal prep dish loaded with all the good stuff. Charred cauliflower and spiced chickpeas are gorgeous with the herby, nutty, vibrant dressing.

Title: Creamy Rose Harissa Spaghetti
Description: Why more people are not coating their spaghetti in spicy harissa paste, tonnes of herbs and creamy mascarpone we do not know. So flavoursome. So saucy.

Title: Squash and Tofu Red Curry
Description: Our vegan version of a Thai takeaway classic. Flavoured with punchy dried chillies and lemongrass, and served up with sticky Tilda Fragrant Jasmine Rice.

Title: Ben's Summer Tomato Pasta
Description: No dish makes tomatoes sing quite like this. Flavoured simply with herbs, chilli and garlic, this pasta is best when topped with gooey buffalo mozzarella.

Title: Aglio E Olio
Description: We have perfected the aglio e olio. Lemon is key. Creating an emulsion with the olive oil & the pasta water makes the most delicious pasta you'll ever eat. We got all the ingredients for this from Deliveroo.

Title: Muttar Paneer
Description: A mild, creamy Punjabi curry for all you cheese lovers. Fried paneer, sweet peas and all the spices. Ditch your takeaway and have this instead. Sophie x

Title: Singapore Noodles
Description: Contrary to what its name suggests, this is actually a Cantonese classic. We’ve omitted prawns and pork to make a non-traditional vegan version of that dish.

Title: Herby Green Rice Shakshuka
Description: This bright green herby shakshuka is packed with parsley and spinach before being topped with toasted pumpkin seeds. Delicious.

Title: Romesco Mac & Cheese
Description: We always wondered why romesco and mac & cheese hadn't been combined. The flavours work perfectly together. Tangy, smoky, cheesy, rich. The perfect mouthful.

Title: Chilli Paneer
Description: An iconic and must-have Indian takeaway. Soft paneer in a sweet and spicy sauce? It’s incredible and so easy to make.

Title: Green Goddess Chopped Salad
Description: A simple chopped salad with a green goddess dressing that's so good you'll want to swim laps in it.

Title: Spanakopita Orzo
Description: A Greek classic transformed into a nutritious, midweek meal that's ready in 30 minutes. This spanakopita orzo is going to be a regular on your dinner table.

Title: Citrus Salad
Description: This recipe has all the makings of a delicious salad. Juicy blood orange, creamy feta, and tangy capers combine to make something really special. Enjoy.

Title: Greek(ish) Tomato Barley
Description: A tomatoey pearl barley dish that’s not unlike a risotto then topped it with a fresh, lemony broccoli salad. It's packed full of nutrients to keep us healthy but it also kind of tastes like you could be sitting in the sun, eating at a taverna on the beach. Bliss.

Title: Charred Onion and Fennel Broth with Fregola, Chickpeas and Feta
Description: Onions and fennel are charred in a hot pan, then simmered in chicken stock with garlic, aromatics, fregola and chickpeas. Once cooked, the soup is finished with lots of soft green herbs, lemon and feta for a hearty but fresh dish.

Title: Black Bean Stew With Nutty Sprinkle
Description: A rich, nutty, spicy black bean dish inspired by Mole Poblano, served with tangy feta drizzle. To scoop up with tortilla crisps.

Title: Romesco Chickpeas
Description: Healthy weeknight dinners don't get much simpler than this. Packed with fibre and protein, this romesco chickpea recipe is a winner.

Title: Spanakopita (Spinach Filo Pie)
Description: This is my recipe for the perfect spanakopita, a spinach and tofu 'feta' pie. As close to the ones we eat at home in Cyprus as possible, it's a real treat.

Title: Pesto Veggie Traybake
Description: Roasted veggies, the crunchiest ciabatta croutons, with a delicious, rich homemade pesto dolloped on top. It just works.

Title: Loaded Veggie Quesadillas
Description: The perfect dinner party dish. Cheesy. Veggie. Crunchy. The whole 9 yards.

Title: Spiced Veggie Gyros
Description: The spiced roast veggies and the cooling tzatziki come together perfectly to form one of the all time great mouthfuls.

Title: Veggie Satay Noodles
Description: Charred veggies are key here. Key key key. Paired with the soft noodles and a creamy peanutty sauce its a very special dish.

Title: Smoky Veggie Enchiladas
Description: Smoky beans are the perfect filling inside these soft, warming enchiladas. Lots of cheddar on the top takes these to the next level.

Title: Triple Lemon Chickpeas
Description: Chickpeas with a zip. If you're into fresh and vibrant veggie-forward dinners then you'll really vibe with this.

Title: Rich Veggie Sausage Sweet Potato Bake
Description: The easiest weeknight dinner. Just throw it all in a tray and bake! You’ll need to stir a dressing together but that's as tricky as it gets, I promise.

Title: Roasted Potato Salad With Apricots, Fennel & Veggie Sausages

Description: Taking the well-loved British chicken and leek pie, making it veggie, and cooking it in one pan. We’re serving ours with grilled Tenderstem. Easy and delicious.

Description: Everyone loves a jacket potato, so we’ve stuffed this with our ultimate veggie chilli for a midweek crowd-pleaser.

Title: Mushroom Miso Barley Bowl
Description: This is for those who love creamy mushrooms.

Description: Herby courgette and veggie meatball kebabs on a bed of mustardy and tangy crème fraîche served with fresh and zingy fennel slaw. Delicious.

Title: Roast Broccoli with Tahini Dressing and Sesame Chilli Crisp
Description: Yinka Ogunbiyi (aka Food Fire and Soul) makes the ultimate veggie centrepiece – a beautiful roasted broccoli with a tahini dressing and homemade chilli oil.

Title: Sticky Sriracha Quorn Bowls
Description: This sticky sriracha rice bowl comes together in 20 mins to make a delicious weeknight dinner.

Title: Green Bean & Feta Pasta
Description: A simple vegetarian pasta recipe that you can make in 15 minutes. Nothing more, nothing less.

Title: Sweet & Spicy Ramen Fried 'Chicken' Burger
Description: A crispy, golden ramen burger with a spicy rich gochujang sauce. This is totally vegetarian and totally delicious.

Title: Tomatoey Butter Beans & Cheese
Description: A delicious centrepiece for everyone to dive into! If you like beans, this is your guy. We used vegan cheese but feel free to sub it with whatever you want.

Title: Cauliflower, Chickpea & Peanut Curry
Description: Packed with all the good stuff, this vegetarian curry is a batch cooking base that just keeps on giving.

Title: Plant-Based Tahini "Chicken" Flatbreads
Description: These saucy tahini chicken flatbreads are made with vegetarian chicken pieces for a delicious plant-based summer wrap.

Title: Creamy Spiced Spinach Chickpeas
Description: A creamy chickpea dish bursting with greens and spices. A healthy vegetarian crowdpleaser inspired by the flavours of a spinach fatayer.

Title: Garlicky Beans & Sausages With Salmoriglio
Description: This veggie dish screams comfort. Creamy beans topped with the fantastic vegetarian sausages and a tangy salmoriglio to cut through all the richness.

Title: Crispy One-Pot Veggie Rice
Description: All you need is one pot and whatever veggies you've got in your fridge to make this simple, weeknight-friendly recipe. It couldn't be easier. It's one of our favourite vegetarian one pot recipes.

Title: Braised Aubergine Lentils With Pesto Yoghurt
Description: Fudgy aubergines? Plump lentils? Pesto yoghurt? This recipe has got it all. A healthy midweek dinner.

Title: Tikka Halloumi & Curried Lentils
Description: A vegetarian alternative to chicken tikka that makes the most of halloumi's wonderfully squeaky texture.

Description: Green kale pasta is a well-loved vegetarian classic. This one comes with some zingy lemon and salty feta for a vibrant twist.

Description: Quick, easy and nourishing vegan miso soup, packed with protein. One of my go-to store cupboard recipes, quicker than boiling pasta. A drizzle of chilli oil and squeeze of lemon finish off this dish perfectly, any day of the year

Title: Vegan Moussaka
Description: This is a classic Greek and Cypriot recipe, made with healthy, plant-based ingredients. It’s a cosy, homely dish that’s perfect for a Sunday lunch. This makes a huge portion but it freezes well, or feel free to halve the recipe.

Description: You may not think tortillas in soup would work well together, but we're here to tell you that it does. And best of all? It's completely vegan.

Description: Tasty vegan tacos with a homemade pea guacamole. Vegan recipes don't get better than this.

Description: If you're into pickles, you're going to be really into this dill pickle soup. It's tangy, briny, and extremely soothing. Get stuck in.

Title: Charred Cabbage & Giant Couscous
Description: Cabbage really doesn’t get the love it deserves. It’s one of the most affordable and versatile veggies out there. Here I’ve charred it and served it with some giant couscous and herby tahini sauce. It’s a great, cheap vegetarian dinner.

Title: Aubergine With Coconut Satay Sauce

Description: If you're looking for a mid-week meal that's healthy and delicious, you're in the right place. Tuck in.

Description: Think a pie's just for winter? Think again. This creamy green halloumi and chickpea filo pie is as refreshing as it is filling. Tuck in.

Description: A super simple, sweet soy-glazed noodle dish! The sauce is cooked using the residual heat of the pan – it concentrates the flavour, giving a sweet and salty profile.

Serve this with couscous, bulgur wheat, freekeh, rice or any other whole grain if you like. If you can’t find pomegranate molasses, you can use balsamic glaze instead.

Remember to factor in an extra hour for letting the pancake batter rest – it's worth it!

Title: Crispy Tofu with Smoky Black Beans & Spicy Orange Salsa
Description: I’ve heard that feijoada, the traditional Brazilian black bean stew, is sometimes eaten with slices of orange, to offset and freshen the richness in the beans. I got inspired by that flavour pairing to make this incredible dish. Whether you’re vegan, veggie or not, I promise you’ll love it.

Title: Whipped Pea, Artichoke & Za’atar with New Potatoes
Description: This whipped pea and artichoke combination makes a great base for the warm potato salad. Another protein-packed, balanced meal that’s great for meal prep.

Title: Savoury Peanut Beans & Sesame Eggs

Title: Spiced Aubergine & Lentil Stew Hummus Bowl

Title: Sweet & Spicy Ramen Fried 'Chicken' Burger
Description: A crispy, golden ramen burger with a spicy rich gochujang sauce. This is totally vegetarian and totally delicious.

Title: Tomatoey Butter Beans & Cheese
Description: A delicious centrepiece for everyone to dive into! If you like beans, this is your guy. We used vegan cheese but feel free to sub it with whatever you want.

Title: Cauliflower, Chickpea & Peanut Curry
Description: Packed with all the good stuff, this vegetarian curry is a batch cooking base that just keeps on giving.

Title: Plant-Based Tahini "Chicken" Flatbreads
Description: These saucy tahini chicken flatbreads are made with vegetarian chicken pieces for a delicious plant-based summer wrap.

Title: Creamy Spiced Spinach Chickpeas
Description: A creamy chickpea dish bursting with greens and spices. A healthy vegetarian crowdpleaser inspired by the flavours of a spinach fatayer.

Title: Garlicky Beans & Sausages With Salmoriglio
Description: This veggie dish screams comfort. Creamy beans topped with the fantastic vegetarian sausages and a tangy salmoriglio to cut through all the richness.

Title: Crispy One-Pot Veggie Rice
Description: All you need is one pot and whatever veggies you've got in your fridge to make this simple, weeknight-friendly recipe. It couldn't be easier. It's one of our favourite vegetarian one pot recipes.

Title: Braised Aubergine Lentils With Pesto Yoghurt
Description: Fudgy aubergines? Plump lentils? Pesto yoghurt? This recipe has got it all. A healthy midweek dinner.

Title: Tikka Halloumi & Curried Lentils
Description: A vegetarian alternative to chicken tikka that makes the most of halloumi's wonderfully squeaky texture.

Title: Zingy Green Pasta
Description: Green kale pasta is a well-loved vegetarian classic. This one comes with some zingy lemon and salty feta for a vibrant twist.

Title: Cannellini Bean & Leek Miso Soup
Description: Quick, easy and nourishing vegan miso soup, packed with protein. One of my go-to store cupboard recipes, quicker than boiling pasta. A drizzle of chilli oil and squeeze of lemon finish off this dish perfectly, any day of the year

Title: Vegan Moussaka
Description: This is a classic Greek and Cypriot recipe, made with healthy, plant-based ingredients. It’s a cosy, homely dish that’s perfect for a Sunday lunch. This makes a huge portion but it freezes well, or feel free to halve the recipe.

Title: Vegan Tortilla Soup
Description: You may not think tortillas in soup would work well together, but we're here to tell you that it does. And best of all? It's completely vegan.

Title: Crispy Mushroom & Black Bean Tacos with Pea Guacamole
Description: Tasty vegan tacos with a homemade pea guacamole. Vegan recipes don't get better than this.

Title: Dill Pickle Soup with Rye Croutons
Description: If you're into pickles, you're going to be really into this dill pickle soup. It's tangy, briny, and extremely soothing. Get stuck in.

Title: Charred Cabbage & Giant Couscous
Description: Cabbage really doesn’t get the love it deserves. It’s one of the most affordable and versatile veggies out there. Here I’ve charred it and served it with some giant couscous and herby tahini sauce. It’s a great, cheap vegetarian dinner.

Title: Aubergine With Coconut Satay Sauce
Description: This vegan recipe combines a rich and fragrant satay sauce with fudgy baked aubergines. It's as good as that sounds.

Title: Chilli Oil Udon
Description: This is one of the quickest noodle recipes out there. The only cooking is boiling the noodles. Make the sauce in the bowl you eat from, using scorching oil to bring the sauce together.

Title: Garlicky White Beans, Roasted Purple Sprouting Broccoli, Chilli & Lemon
Description: If you're looking for a mid-week meal that's healthy and delicious, you're in the right place. Tuck in.

Title: Creamy Green Halloumi & Chickpea Filo Pie
Description: Think a pie's just for winter? Think again. This creamy green halloumi and chickpea filo pie is as refreshing as it is filling. Tuck in.

Title: Spring Onion Soy Udon
Description: A super simple, sweet soy-glazed noodle dish! The sauce is cooked using the residual heat of the pan – it concentrates the flavour, giving a sweet and salty profile.

Title: Spiced Roasted Squash with Pomegranate Molasses & Pistachios
Description: When squash is in season, there are so many delicious things to do with it, but serving it with dates, tahini and tangy pomegranate molasses creates a perfect medley of textures and flavours that complement each other so well. Serve this with couscous, bulgur wheat, freekeh, rice or any other whole grain if you like. If you can’t find pomegranate molasses, you can use balsamic glaze instead.

Title: Spanakopita Pancakes
Description: Adding spinach and dill to the batter gives these pancakes their green herby goodness, then we’ve stuffed them with a creamy cottage cheese filling and topped them with a runny fried egg for a protein boost. Remember to factor in an extra hour for letting the pancake batter rest – it's worth it!

Title: Crispy Tofu with Smoky Black Beans & Spicy Orange Salsa
Description: I’ve heard that feijoada, the traditional Brazilian black bean stew, is sometimes eaten with slices of orange, to offset and freshen the richness in the beans. I got inspired by that flavour pairing to make this incredible dish. Whether you’re vegan, veggie or not, I promise you’ll love it.

Title: Whipped Pea, Artichoke & Za’atar with New Potatoes
Description: This whipped pea and artichoke combination makes a great base for the warm potato salad. Another protein-packed, balanced meal that’s great for meal prep.

Title: Savoury Peanut Beans & Sesame Eggs
Description: A cosy, nourishing bowl that packs a punch in terms of flavour. The peanut butter, eggs and butter beans provide loads of protein to keep you fuller for longer. Batch-cook a load of the beans and slaw and thank yourself later.

Title: Spiced Aubergine & Lentil Stew Hummus Bowl
Description: Loaded hummus is always a good idea, and this one goes the extra mile. A saucy, spiced aubergine and lentil stew blends into the creamy hummus below.  It’s a full meal, packed with protein, fibre and flavour and is perfectly scoopable.

Title: Sticky Aubergine Rice Bowl
Description: This is a recipe is the Holy Trinity of sticky, sweet and spicy. Give it a go, Mob, you won’t regret it. Plus the variety of veg gives a great kick of fibre.

Title: Creamed Sesame Spinach Orzo
Description: Creamed spinach is our favourite side dishes. We've thrown the flavours of that into this easy orzo recipe.

Title: Curried Lentil, Sweet Potato & Coconut Gratin
Description: This delicious, creamy, coconutty dish is something between a shepherd’s pie and a curry. With curried coconut cream bringing the creaminess and flavour, it’s a simple, healthy and incredibly tasty all-in-one.

Title: Chickpea Peanut Butter Curry
Description: All you need is 20 minutes to make this rich and creamy vegan peanut butter curry. The secret ingredient for injecting extra flavour is a splash of soy sauce.

Title: Blackened Leeks & Nutty Chipotle Salsa
Description: Soft, charred leeks on creamy ricotta, served with smoky, nutty salsa inspired by salsa macha.

Title: Mujadara
Description: This is a speedy version of the Lebanese dish Mujadara. You really can't go wrong with rice and lentils, which is exactly what this dish is offering. Enjoy.

Title: Creamy Courgette Penne Traybake
Description: The easiest (and creamiest) dinner you'll cook this week. It's sort of a pasta bake, sort of a traybake, and completely delicious.

Title: Soy Butter Aubergine Noodles
Description: Easy, breezy, umami noodles. This is a great recipe you can get on the table in 30 minutes.

Title: Charred Leeks, Butter Beans & Pickled Chilli Sauce
Description: Comforting leeks and beans with some pickled chilli, lemon, white wine and crispy capers for a little pizzazz. This is a vegan recipe you're going to love.

Title: One-Pot Tomato Orzo
Description: Here's an incredibly simple vegan orzo dish that's loaded with rich, beautiful tomatoes. It's an absolute winner.

Title: Chickpea & Paneer Curry
Description: Paneer was made for curries. And this simple yet incredibly fragrant chickpea curry with soft chunks of paneer is proof. Serve with fluffy Tilda Basmati Rice.

Title: Butternut Squash & Marmite Gnocchi Traybake
Description: This cheesy butternut squash gnocchi bake will give your fave mac and cheese recipe a real run for its money. Easy, cheesy goodness.

Title: Herby Curried Chickpeas With Curry Leaf Tarka
Description: Here, herbs and spices reign supreme, making this a really easy, high reward recipe. We're talking herby chickpeas topped with a curry leaf tarka. Tuck in.

Title: Tomato Soup
Description: Nothing beats a bowl of homemade soup. This recipe for cream of tomato soup is an absolute classic. You’ll never touch the tinned stuff again. We got all the ingredients for this recipe from Deliveroo.

Title: Tahini Noodles with Smacked Cucumbers
Description: So fresh, so clean. We love a noodle salad on a hot summery day. This one is paired with marinated smacked cucumbers and tossed in a tasty tahini sauce.

Title: Gnocchi with Smashed Peas, Lemon & Parmesan
Description: This is my smashed pea gnocchi. It's a stunner of a summer dish and dead simple. You can use fresh peas if you like, but frozen really are the best. B x

Title: Spinach Pakoras With Tamarind Chutney
Description: Crispy battered spinach fritters with a sweet and tangy tamarind chutney.  A perfect recipe for Iftar.

Title: Butter Halloumi Curry
Description: Enriching the curry with butter is a brilliant way of adding creaminess and richness. The salty nuggets of halloumi in the sauce make it a winning meal.

Title: Honey Harissa Carrots With Whipped Feta
Description: Delicious, spicy sweet carrots on a bed of creamy whipped feta, perfect with some warm flatbreads.

Title: Numbing Aubergine White Bean Bowl
Description: Crushed Sichuan peppercorns add a nice hum to this recipe. It's spicy, tingly, and will shake up your palate in all the right ways.

Title: Crunchy Onion Veggie Smash Burgers
Description: Veggie burgers don't suck. But a lot of vegetarian burger recipes do. Rest assured that this is an extremely good vegetarian smash burger recipe.

Title: Veggie Sausage Traybake with Broccoli Salsa
Description: A quick and easy vegetarian-friendly traybake. This one is a Mediterranean-inspired delight.

Title: Cavolo Nero & Wild Mushroom Risotto
Description: We’ve added some extra greens to this risotto by throwing in cavolo nero – high in fibre and calcium – and finished it with garlicky mushrooms and Parmesan.

Title: Buttery Three-Chilli Linguine
Description: Very buttery, silky smooth and a little bit spicy. This simple vegetarian-friendly pasta recipe has got it all.

Title: Spicy Mushroom Pozole
Description: A vegetarian pozole recipe that makes the most of chipotle paste, tender mushrooms, and corn tortillas. A real hearty affair.

Description: Mob, it's time to ditch the takeaway. Instead, feast your eyes on these ridiculously delicious and ridiculously easy vegetarian samosas, courtesy of Romy Gill.

Title: Brothy Roast Tomatoes, Fennel & Giant Couscous
Description: This recipe doesn't require a lot of prep and it's extremely comforting. A great one to use as a blueprint for whatever you have on hand.

Description: A tomato and pesto situation teamed with oh-so perfect jammy eggs. The perfect 6-ingredient recipe, great for meat eaters and vegetarians alike.

Title: Green Hummus Bowl
Description: We've made a cheat-y hummus with loads of herbs and served it up topped with sticky halloumi. Dreamy, easy, dinner.

Description: Forget about whole roasted cauliflower, roasting your broccoli whole is where it’s at. Serve this with a herby rice salad as a veggie centrepiece.

Title: Tofu Satay Skewers
Description: This is our version of a Malaysian street-food snack. We’ve loaded it with bold anti-inflammatory spices, which, when combined with fresh cucumber pickles.

Title: Turmeric Tomato Noodles
Description: Udon noodles are such a life-saver when you're pushed for time. We've jazzed them up here with tomatoes, turmeric, and a dash of miso.

Title: Herby Feta Scrambled Eggs
Description: This is an incredibly simple, fresh twist on scrambled eggs that uses one of our favourite ingredients: feta. It's a winner.

Title: Corn & Ricotta Gnocchi
Description: If you’re debating what to have for dinner, make this. We used corn to make this sauce rich in fibre, which combines with the ricotta creates a creamy sauce.

Description: Dhansak is a popular Indian curry usually made with goat or mutton. We’ve created an untraditional vegan riff on it, using aubergine instead.

Description: This miso mushroom pie is umami, creamy and flaky, served with a bright wafu style sauce to balance the flavours.

Title: 3 Ingredient Creamy Pasta
Description: Three ingredients, 10 minutes, dinner is served. This easy and creamy vegan pasta is to die for.

Title: Gado Gado Peanut Noodle Salad
Description: A gorg super salad loaded with fresh ingredients and coated in a moreish peanut sauce. Perfect for a healthy weeknight dinner or throw-together lunch.

Title: Aglio E Olio Chickpeas
Description: 5 ingredients. 20 minutes. A fresh, protein-packed dish.

Title: Melted Broccoli & Capers Pasta
Description: An extremely umami pasta recipe that's great for a quick weeknight fix. It's vegetarian, too.

Title: Spiced Pea and Potato Rolls
Description: We were inspired by a filling you might traditionally find in a samosa to create this delicious vegetarian sausage roll.

Title: Chickpea Aguachile Verde
Description: A bright and citrussy vegetarian aguachile recipe that requires absolutely zero cooking. This makes a lovely fresh side or a light main.

Title: Sticky Harissa Onion Linguine With Dukkah Breadcrumbs
Description: This vegetarian pasta recipe is sticky, spicy and silky. Oh, and it's jammy, carby and crispy, too. This is an all-timer.

Title: Caprese Butter Bean Bake
Description: A gorgeous butter bean bake inspired by the flavours of a caprese salad. A hugely satisfying vegetarian weeknight dinner.

Title: Aubergine Dal With Mango Chutney Yoghurt
Description: A simple, vegetarian dal recipe that's got plenty of protein and fibre. This is a healthy weeknight dinner if we've ever seen one.

Title: 6-Ingredient Carrot & Sage Risotto
Description: A warming six-ingredient risotto that makes the most of seasonal veg. Carrots a nice, natural sweetness to this recipe.

Title: Vegan Harissa Ragù
Description: A thick and rich ragù spiced with a fragrant harissa paste tossed in pasta. This twist on a classic is undoubtedly delicious.

Title: Cheesy Marmite Mushroom Pie
Description: A beautiful, wintery, rib-sticking, mushroom and ale pie. Pie is proper Sunday food and nothing else hits the spot like it.

Title: Gunpowder Potatoes With Garlic Yoghurt Aioli
Description: Level up your potatoes with this super spice mix, quick pickled onions and a crunchy almond topping, all balanced out with a  cooling yoghurt aioli. They make a perfect side dish or add some roasted veggies, beans or tofu to turn it into a complete meal.

Title: Curry Oil Squash & Chickpeas With Lime Yoghurt
Description: If you're a fan of butternut squash then you're going to go crazy for this one. Caramelised squash and crispy chickpeas? Check.

Title: Leek & Sweet Potato Soup
Description: This leek and sweet potato soup is a recipe you can make in just one tray. The buttery leeks and soft sweet potatoes are a match made in heaven.

Title: Cauliflower Cheese Gnocchi Traybake
Description: Cauliflower, cheese, gnocchi, and traybake are four of our favourite words. This creamy midweek dinner will have everyone very fed and happy.

Title: Cauliflower, Mushroom & Walnut Bolognese
Description: A rich and luxurious veggie-packed bolognese. You won't miss the meat in this beauty.

Title: Carrot & Coriander Soup
Description: A simple and delicious carrot and coriander soup recipe that'll give any other carrot and coriander soup a run for its money. The secret is roasting your veg until it's nice and caramelised.

Title: Sweet & Sour Hasselback Aubergine with Rice
Description: This faff-free recipe looks super impressive served on a table. If you're not hasselback-ing your aubergines, what are you doing with your life?

Title: Smoked Aubergine Milanese
Description: Crunchy, creamy, smoky aubergine nugget with tomato sauce – an amazing vegetarian take on a milanese (or katsu) to enjoy over steaming hot rice.

Title: Tomato & Basil Pasta
Description: I can’t think of a more perfect pasta for a balmy summer evening than this tomato and basil pasta. It’s not often that you can enjoy warm, chewy al dente spaghetti with the bright juiciness of a summer tomato in one forkful. Well, here’s your chance.

Title: Thai Coconut Rice Pudding With Sesame Peanut Crunch
Description: We love rice pudding and we love Thai coconut rice. This is the best of both worlds. It's salty and sweet and the crunch on top is so addictive.

Title: Roasted Squash & Mozzarella Salad
Description: This seasonal winter salad satisfies all the cravings. It’s hearty, healthy and nutritious.

Title: Gobi Manchurian
Description: This gobi Manchurian recipe from Antony Amourdoux is a real crowdpleaser. You'll love how sweet, sticky, and spicy it is.

Title: Brothy Roast Squash & Pasta With Greens
Description: Think of this recipe as a wintery minestrone, but less soupy and topped with green pesto for a low effort zhuzh. It’s warming, easy and packed full of vitamins to keep you healthy over the colder months.

Title: Pea & Leek Soup With Chilli Jam Goat’s Cheese Toasts
Description: This is our take on an old school comfort leek and potato soup with some frozen peas and a bag of salad thrown in to make this as vibrant as it is comforting. Plus cheesy chilli jam toasts for pizazz.

Title: Halloumi & Roasted Grape Giant Couscous
Description: Roasted grapes are a current obsession - we love how jammy they go when they burst. Their sweetness is perfect with salty halloumi in this simple, one pan veggie tray bake that you’ll be making on repeat.

Title: Miso Onion Soup
Description: A simple and delicious tray soup that's worth simmering up on the weekend.

Title: Chickpea Tikka Masala Wraps
Description: The curried onion, peppers and chickpeas combine with the speedy coriander sauce, yoghurt and lettuce for an absolute vibe. Use dairy-free yoghurt and wraps to keep this one plant based.

Title: Peanut Butter Paneer Curry
Description: This midweek curry is the perfect veggie number to comfort while also getting in a dose of veg. It's good eating.

Title: Chunky Vegetable Soup With Squash, Kale & Parmesan Croutons
Description: Packed with vegetables and all sorts of goodness, this vegetable soup recipe will cure just any cold. Maybe. Don't use this as a substitute for actual medicine. Do eat it for dinner.

Title: Tomato Curry Egg Drop Rice
Description: When I am home, tired, hungry and need something quick and nourishing I make this. A take on a classic Hong Kong dish, with a little spice and inspired by Lucas Sin’s egg drop method.

Title: "Heal Me" Minestrone Soup
Description: There are few soups better than a minestrone, and this minestrone soup recipe from Alfie Steiner (aka @alfiecooks_) is pure comfort in a bowl. Guaranteed to make you feel better, whatever the weather, it’s packed full of your favourite veggies and juicy legumes, making it incredibly good for you too. An absolute winter staple.

Title: Roasted Carrot Soup With Sesame Halloumi Croutons
Description: Soup is a staple in our flat. It never fails to blow my mind the flavour you get out of roasted veg. Here, I’ve gone for classic carrot with some cumin, garlic and pomegranate molasses for a tangy kick. Plus there are spicy sesame cheese ‘croutons’ on top, because why not?

Title: Ginger Lemon Lentil Porridge
Description: Inspired by Khicidi (or Khichri) with plenty of gentle lentils, this recipe is a great source of protein and nutrition. We added lots of lemon ginger and aromatic ginger sesame oil for a proper warming bowl of serious cosy goodness.

Title: Creamy Celeriac Pasta with Nutty Herb Crumb
Description: This vegan pasta gets its creamy texture with the help of the celeriac. It’s full of umami and is very easy to make.

Title: Veggie Egg Fried Rice
Description: A belter of a dish. Charred veggies and eggy rice, topped with the crispiest shallots in the land. So easy. So cheap. So delicious.

Title: Broccoli Cheese Pie
Description: It's pie weather. This cheesy, veggie-friendly pie is loaded with broccoli and a mountain of cheddar. It's just the thing to get you through the evening.

Title: Roasted Cauliflower and Green Tahini Salad
Description: A beautiful meal prep dish loaded with all the good stuff. Charred cauliflower and spiced chickpeas are gorgeous with the herby, nutty, vibrant dressing.

Title: Creamy Rose Harissa Spaghetti
Description: Why more people are not coating their spaghetti in spicy harissa paste, tonnes of herbs and creamy mascarpone we do not know. So flavoursome. So saucy.

Title: Squash and Tofu Red Curry
Description: Our vegan version of a Thai takeaway classic. Flavoured with punchy dried chillies and lemongrass, and served up with sticky Tilda Fragrant Jasmine Rice.

Title: Ben's Summer Tomato Pasta
Description: No dish makes tomatoes sing quite like this. Flavoured simply with herbs, chilli and garlic, this pasta is best when topped with gooey buffalo mozzarella.

Title: Aglio E Olio
Description: We have perfected the aglio e olio. Lemon is key. Creating an emulsion with the olive oil & the pasta water makes the most delicious pasta you'll ever eat. We got all the ingredients for this from Deliveroo.

Title: Muttar Paneer
Description: A mild, creamy Punjabi curry for all you cheese lovers. Fried paneer, sweet peas and all the spices. Ditch your takeaway and have this instead. Sophie x

Title: Singapore Noodles
Description: Contrary to what its name suggests, this is actually a Cantonese classic. We’ve omitted prawns and pork to make a non-traditional vegan version of that dish.

Title: Herby Green Rice Shakshuka
Description: This bright green herby shakshuka is packed with parsley and spinach before being topped with toasted pumpkin seeds. Delicious.

Title: Romesco Mac & Cheese
Description: We always wondered why romesco and mac & cheese hadn't been combined. The flavours work perfectly together. Tangy, smoky, cheesy, rich. The perfect mouthful.

Title: Chilli Paneer
Description: An iconic and must-have Indian takeaway. Soft paneer in a sweet and spicy sauce? It’s incredible and so easy to make.

Title: Green Goddess Chopped Salad
Description: A simple chopped salad with a green goddess dressing that's so good you'll want to swim laps in it.

Title: Spanakopita Orzo
Description: A Greek classic transformed into a nutritious, midweek meal that's ready in 30 minutes. This spanakopita orzo is going to be a regular on your dinner table.

Title: Citrus Salad
Description: This recipe has all the makings of a delicious salad. Juicy blood orange, creamy feta, and tangy capers combine to make something really special. Enjoy.

Title: Greek(ish) Tomato Barley
Description: A tomatoey pearl barley dish that’s not unlike a risotto then topped it with a fresh, lemony broccoli salad. It's packed full of nutrients to keep us healthy but it also kind of tastes like you could be sitting in the sun, eating at a taverna on the beach. Bliss.

Title: Charred Onion and Fennel Broth with Fregola, Chickpeas and Feta
Description: Onions and fennel are charred in a hot pan, then simmered in chicken stock with garlic, aromatics, fregola and chickpeas. Once cooked, the soup is finished with lots of soft green herbs, lemon and feta for a hearty but fresh dish.

Title: Black Bean Stew With Nutty Sprinkle
Description: A rich, nutty, spicy black bean dish inspired by Mole Poblano, served with tangy feta drizzle. To scoop up with tortilla crisps.

Title: Romesco Chickpeas
Description: Healthy weeknight dinners don't get much simpler than this. Packed with fibre and protein, this romesco chickpea recipe is a winner.

Title: Spanakopita (Spinach Filo Pie)
Description: This is my recipe for the perfect spanakopita, a spinach and tofu 'feta' pie. As close to the ones we eat at home in Cyprus as possible, it's a real treat.

Title: Pesto Veggie Traybake
Description: Roasted veggies, the crunchiest ciabatta croutons, with a delicious, rich homemade pesto dolloped on top. It just works.

Title: Loaded Veggie Quesadillas
Description: The perfect dinner party dish. Cheesy. Veggie. Crunchy. The whole 9 yards.

Title: Spiced Veggie Gyros
Description: The spiced roast veggies and the cooling tzatziki come together perfectly to form one of the all time great mouthfuls.

Title: Veggie Satay Noodles
Description: Charred veggies are key here. Key key key. Paired with the soft noodles and a creamy peanutty sauce its a very special dish.

Title: Smoky Veggie Enchiladas
Description: Smoky beans are the perfect filling inside these soft, warming enchiladas. Lots of cheddar on the top takes these to the next level.

Title: Triple Lemon Chickpeas
Description: Chickpeas with a zip. If you're into fresh and vibrant veggie-forward dinners then you'll really vibe with this.

Title: Rich Veggie Sausage Sweet Potato Bake
Description: The easiest weeknight dinner. Just throw it all in a tray and bake! You’ll need to stir a dressing together but that's as tricky as it gets, I promise.

Title: Roasted Potato Salad With Apricots, Fennel & Veggie Sausages
Description: This is an extra special take on the classic (but boring, sorry) potato salad. Fresh fennel and roasted apricots take things up a gear or two.

Title: Smoky Grilled Mushroom Döner
Description: If you find it hard to believe that a döner kebab can be healthy, we're here to prove you wrong. This veggie-style grilled mushroom döner will have you feeling like you're post night out minus the regret. Enjoy.

Title: Pulled Mushroom Ragù
Description: The richest, umami-est mushroom ragu you could dream of. Pulled oyster mushrooms replace meat here, and they do it well. Delightful.

Title: Batch Recipe: Veggie Chilli Sin Carne
Description: This is the ultimate veggie chilli packed full of beans, spices and some new ingredients that you might not have thought of using before.

Title: One-Pot Veggie & Leek Pie
Description: Taking the well-loved British chicken and leek pie, making it veggie, and cooking it in one pan. We’re serving ours with grilled Tenderstem. Easy and delicious.

Title: Bean Chilli-Stuffed Jacket Potato with Lime Pickled Onions & Avocado
Description: Everyone loves a jacket potato, so we’ve stuffed this with our ultimate veggie chilli for a midweek crowd-pleaser.

Title: Twice-Roasted Pumpkin & Salted Maple Pecan Drizzle
Description: Roasting your pumpkin twice makes it sweet and sticky and incredibly moreish. We've topped it off with a salted maple pecan drizzle that's to die for. A wicked veggie centrepiece.

Title: Mushroom Miso Barley Bowl
Description: This is for those who love creamy mushrooms.

Title: Veggie Meatball Kebabs With Fennel & Pumpkin Seed Slaw
Description: Herby courgette and veggie meatball kebabs on a bed of mustardy and tangy crème fraîche served with fresh and zingy fennel slaw. Delicious.

Title: Roast Broccoli with Tahini Dressing and Sesame Chilli Crisp
Description: Yinka Ogunbiyi (aka Food Fire and Soul) makes the ultimate veggie centrepiece – a beautiful roasted broccoli with a tahini dressing and homemade chilli oil.

Title: Sticky Sriracha Quorn Bowls
Description: This sticky sriracha rice bowl comes together in 20 mins to make a delicious weeknight dinner.

Description: A simple vegetarian pasta recipe that you can make in 15 minutes. Nothing more, nothing less.

Description: Packed with all the good stuff, this vegetarian curry is a batch cooking base that just keeps on giving.

Description: Fudgy aubergines? Plump lentils? Pesto yoghurt? This recipe has got it all. A healthy midweek dinner.

Title: Vegan Moussaka
Description: This is a classic Greek and Cypriot recipe, made with healthy, plant-based ingredients. It’s a cosy, homely dish that’s perfect for a Sunday lunch. This makes a huge portion but it freezes well, or feel free to halve the recipe.

Title: Vegan Tortilla Soup
Description: You may not think tortillas in soup would work well together, but we're here to tell you that it does. And best of all? It's completely vegan.

Title: Crispy Mushroom & Black Bean Tacos with Pea Guacamole
Description: Tasty vegan tacos with a homemade pea guacamole. Vegan recipes don't get better than this.

Title: Dill Pickle Soup with Rye Croutons
Description: If you're into pickles, you're going to be really into this dill pickle soup. It's tangy, briny, and extremely soothing. Get stuck in.

Title: Charred Cabbage & Giant Couscous
Description: Cabbage really doesn’t get the love it deserves. It’s one of the most affordable and versatile veggies out there. Here I’ve charred it and served it with some giant couscous and herby tahini sauce. It’s a great, cheap vegetarian dinner.

Title: Aubergine With Coconut Satay Sauce
Description: This vegan recipe combines a rich and fragrant satay sauce with fudgy baked aubergines. It's as good as that sounds.

Title: Chilli Oil Udon
Description: This is one of the quickest noodle recipes out there. The only cooking is boiling the noodles. Make the sauce in the bowl you eat from, using scorching oil to bring the sauce together.

Title: Garlicky White Beans, Roasted Purple Sprouting Broccoli, Chilli & Lemon
Description: If you're looking for a mid-week meal that's healthy and delicious, you're in the right place. Tuck in.

Title: Creamy Green Halloumi & Chickpea Filo Pie
Description: Think a pie's just for winter? Think again. This creamy green halloumi and chickpea filo pie is as refreshing as it is filling. Tuck in.

Title: Spring Onion Soy Udon
Description: A super simple, sweet soy-glazed noodle dish! The sauce is cooked using the residual heat of the pan – it concentrates the flavour, giving a sweet and salty profile.

Title: Spiced Roasted Squash with Pomegranate Molasses & Pistachios
Description: When squash is in season, there are so many delicious things to do with it, but serving it with dates, tahini and tangy pomegranate molasses creates a perfect medley of textures and flavours that complement each other so well. Serve this with couscous, bulgur wheat, freekeh, rice or any other whole grain if you like. If you can’t find pomegranate molasses, you can use balsamic glaze instead.

Title: Spanakopita Pancakes
Description: Adding spinach and dill to the batter gives these pancakes their green herby goodness, then we’ve stuffed them with a creamy cottage cheese filling and topped them with a runny fried egg for a protein boost. Remember to factor in an extra hour for letting the pancake batter rest – it's worth it!

Title: Crispy Tofu with Smoky Black Beans & Spicy Orange Salsa
Description: I’ve heard that feijoada, the traditional Brazilian black bean stew, is sometimes eaten with slices of orange, to offset and freshen the richness in the beans. I got inspired by that flavour pairing to make this incredible dish. Whether you’re vegan, veggie or not, I promise you’ll love it.

Title: Whipped Pea, Artichoke & Za’atar with New Potatoes
Description: This whipped pea and artichoke combination makes a great base for the warm potato salad. Another protein-packed, balanced meal that’s great for meal prep.

Title: Savoury Peanut Beans & Sesame Eggs
Description: A cosy, nourishing bowl that packs a punch in terms of flavour. The peanut butter, eggs and butter beans provide loads of protein to keep you fuller for longer. Batch-cook a load of the beans and slaw and thank yourself later.

Title: Spiced Aubergine & Lentil Stew Hummus Bowl
Description: Loaded hummus is always a good idea, and this one goes the extra mile. A saucy, spiced aubergine and lentil stew blends into the creamy hummus below.  It’s a full meal, packed with protein, fibre and flavour and is perfectly scoopable.

Title: Sticky Aubergine Rice Bowl
Description: This is a recipe is the Holy Trinity of sticky, sweet and spicy. Give it a go, Mob, you won’t regret it. Plus the variety of veg gives a great kick of fibre.

Title: Creamed Sesame Spinach Orzo
Description: Creamed spinach is our favourite side dishes. We've thrown the flavours of that into this easy orzo recipe.

Title: Curried Lentil, Sweet Potato & Coconut Gratin
Description: This delicious, creamy, coconutty dish is something between a shepherd’s pie and a curry. With curried coconut cream bringing the creaminess and flavour, it’s a simple, healthy and incredibly tasty all-in-one.

Title: Chickpea Peanut Butter Curry
Description: All you need is 20 minutes to make this rich and creamy vegan peanut butter curry. The secret ingredient for injecting extra flavour is a splash of soy sauce.

Title: Blackened Leeks & Nutty Chipotle Salsa
Description: Soft, charred leeks on creamy ricotta, served with smoky, nutty salsa inspired by salsa macha.

Title: Mujadara
Description: This is a speedy version of the Lebanese dish Mujadara. You really can't go wrong with rice and lentils, which is exactly what this dish is offering. Enjoy.

Title: Creamy Courgette Penne Traybake
Description: The easiest (and creamiest) dinner you'll cook this week. It's sort of a pasta bake, sort of a traybake, and completely delicious.

Title: Soy Butter Aubergine Noodles
Description: Easy, breezy, umami noodles. This is a great recipe you can get on the table in 30 minutes.

Title: Charred Leeks, Butter Beans & Pickled Chilli Sauce
Description: Comforting leeks and beans with some pickled chilli, lemon, white wine and crispy capers for a little pizzazz. This is a vegan recipe you're going to love.

Title: One-Pot Tomato Orzo
Description: Here's an incredibly simple vegan orzo dish that's loaded with rich, beautiful tomatoes. It's an absolute winner.

Title: Chickpea & Paneer Curry
Description: Paneer was made for curries. And this simple yet incredibly fragrant chickpea curry with soft chunks of paneer is proof. Serve with fluffy Tilda Basmati Rice.

Title: Butternut Squash & Marmite Gnocchi Traybake
Description: This cheesy butternut squash gnocchi bake will give your fave mac and cheese recipe a real run for its money. Easy, cheesy goodness.

Title: Herby Curried Chickpeas With Curry Leaf Tarka
Description: Here, herbs and spices reign supreme, making this a really easy, high reward recipe. We're talking herby chickpeas topped with a curry leaf tarka. Tuck in.

Title: Tomato Soup
Description: Nothing beats a bowl of homemade soup. This recipe for cream of tomato soup is an absolute classic. You’ll never touch the tinned stuff again. We got all the ingredients for this recipe from Deliveroo.

Title: Tahini Noodles with Smacked Cucumbers
Description: So fresh, so clean. We love a noodle salad on a hot summery day. This one is paired with marinated smacked cucumbers and tossed in a tasty tahini sauce.

Title: Gnocchi with Smashed Peas, Lemon & Parmesan
Description: This is my smashed pea gnocchi. It's a stunner of a summer dish and dead simple. You can use fresh peas if you like, but frozen really are the best. B x

Title: Spinach Pakoras With Tamarind Chutney
Description: Crispy battered spinach fritters with a sweet and tangy tamarind chutney.  A perfect recipe for Iftar.

Title: Butter Halloumi Curry
Description: Enriching the curry with butter is a brilliant way of adding creaminess and richness. The salty nuggets of halloumi in the sauce make it a winning meal.

Title: Honey Harissa Carrots With Whipped Feta
Description: Delicious, spicy sweet carrots on a bed of creamy whipped feta, perfect with some warm flatbreads.

Title: Numbing Aubergine White Bean Bowl
Description: Crushed Sichuan peppercorns add a nice hum to this recipe. It's spicy, tingly, and will shake up your palate in all the right ways.

Title: Crunchy Onion Veggie Smash Burgers
Description: Veggie burgers don't suck. But a lot of vegetarian burger recipes do. Rest assured that this is an extremely good vegetarian smash burger recipe.

Title: Veggie Sausage Traybake with Broccoli Salsa
Description: A quick and easy vegetarian-friendly traybake. This one is a Mediterranean-inspired delight.

Title: Cavolo Nero & Wild Mushroom Risotto
Description: We’ve added some extra greens to this risotto by throwing in cavolo nero – high in fibre and calcium – and finished it with garlicky mushrooms and Parmesan.

Title: Buttery Three-Chilli Linguine
Description: Very buttery, silky smooth and a little bit spicy. This simple vegetarian-friendly pasta recipe has got it all.

Title: Spicy Mushroom Pozole
Description: A vegetarian pozole recipe that makes the most of chipotle paste, tender mushrooms, and corn tortillas. A real hearty affair.

Title: Veggie Samosas
Description: Mob, it's time to ditch the takeaway. Instead, feast your eyes on these ridiculously delicious and ridiculously easy vegetarian samosas, courtesy of Romy Gill.

Title: Brothy Roast Tomatoes, Fennel & Giant Couscous
Description: This recipe doesn't require a lot of prep and it's extremely comforting. A great one to use as a blueprint for whatever you have on hand.

Title: Jammy Eggs With Blistered Tomatoes & Pesto Lentils
Description: A tomato and pesto situation teamed with oh-so perfect jammy eggs. The perfect 6-ingredient recipe, great for meat eaters and vegetarians alike.

Title: Green Hummus Bowl
Description: We've made a cheat-y hummus with loads of herbs and served it up topped with sticky halloumi. Dreamy, easy, dinner.

Description: Forget about whole roasted cauliflower, roasting your broccoli whole is where it’s at. Serve this with a herby rice salad as a veggie centrepiece.

Title: Tofu Satay Skewers
Description: This is our version of a Malaysian street-food snack. We’ve loaded it with bold anti-inflammatory spices, which, when combined with fresh cucumber pickles.

Title: Turmeric Tomato Noodles
Description: Udon noodles are such a life-saver when you're pushed for time. We've jazzed them up here with tomatoes, turmeric, and a dash of miso.

Title: Herby Feta Scrambled Eggs
Description: This is an incredibly simple, fresh twist on scrambled eggs that uses one of our favourite ingredients: feta. It's a winner.

Title: Corn & Ricotta Gnocchi
Description: If you’re debating what to have for dinner, make this. We used corn to make this sauce rich in fibre, which combines with the ricotta creates a creamy sauce.

Description: Dhansak is a popular Indian curry usually made with goat or mutton. We’ve created an untraditional vegan riff on it, using aubergine instead.

Title: Miso Mushroom Quiche
Description: This miso mushroom pie is umami, creamy and flaky, served with a bright wafu style sauce to balance the flavours.

Title: 3 Ingredient Creamy Pasta
Description: Three ingredients, 10 minutes, dinner is served. This easy and creamy vegan pasta is to die for.

Title: Gado Gado Peanut Noodle Salad
Description: A gorg super salad loaded with fresh ingredients and coated in a moreish peanut sauce. Perfect for a healthy weeknight dinner or throw-together lunch.

Title: Aglio E Olio Chickpeas
Description: 5 ingredients. 20 minutes. A fresh, protein-packed dish.

Title: Melted Broccoli & Capers Pasta
Description: An extremely umami pasta recipe that's great for a quick weeknight fix. It's vegetarian, too.

Title: Spiced Pea and Potato Rolls
Description: We were inspired by a filling you might traditionally find in a samosa to create this delicious vegetarian sausage roll.

Title: Chickpea Aguachile Verde
Description: A bright and citrussy vegetarian aguachile recipe that requires absolutely zero cooking. This makes a lovely fresh side or a light main.

Title: Sticky Harissa Onion Linguine With Dukkah Breadcrumbs
Description: This vegetarian pasta recipe is sticky, spicy and silky. Oh, and it's jammy, carby and crispy, too. This is an all-timer.

Title: Caprese Butter Bean Bake
Description: A gorgeous butter bean bake inspired by the flavours of a caprese salad. A hugely satisfying vegetarian weeknight dinner.

Title: Aubergine Dal With Mango Chutney Yoghurt
Description: A simple, vegetarian dal recipe that's got plenty of protein and fibre. This is a healthy weeknight dinner if we've ever seen one.

Title: 6-Ingredient Carrot & Sage Risotto
Description: A warming six-ingredient risotto that makes the most of seasonal veg. Carrots a nice, natural sweetness to this recipe.

Title: Vegan Harissa Ragù
Description: A thick and rich ragù spiced with a fragrant harissa paste tossed in pasta. This twist on a classic is undoubtedly delicious.

Title: Cheesy Marmite Mushroom Pie
Description: A beautiful, wintery, rib-sticking, mushroom and ale pie. Pie is proper Sunday food and nothing else hits the spot like it.

Title: Gunpowder Potatoes With Garlic Yoghurt Aioli
Description: Level up your potatoes with this super spice mix, quick pickled onions and a crunchy almond topping, all balanced out with a  cooling yoghurt aioli. They make a perfect side dish or add some roasted veggies, beans or tofu to turn it into a complete meal.

Title: Curry Oil Squash & Chickpeas With Lime Yoghurt
Description: If you're a fan of butternut squash then you're going to go crazy for this one. Caramelised squash and crispy chickpeas? Check.
